member.name: T:MediaChrome.IPlayEngine
member.summary: A media service plug in for media chrome. Each music service who want to be integrated with the mediachrome framework must implement this class.

member.name: M:MediaChrome.IPlayEngine.ShowOptions
member.summary: Shows options dialogue.

member.name: M:MediaChrome.IPlayEngine.Purchase(MediaChrome.Song)
member.summary: Handles purchases of an song
member.returns: Whether the purchase was accepted or rejected by the merchant

member.name: M:MediaChrome.IPlayEngine.Login
member.summary: Show the log in creditals. Log in is handled by each service

member.name: M:MediaChrome.IPlayEngine.Logout
member.summary: Method for logging out the user from the service

member.name: M:MediaChrome.IPlayEngine.GetArtist(System.String)
member.summary: Get an artist by ID
member.param: The ID or name of the artist to retrieve, depending on the service
member.returns: An artist enclosed in an instance of MediaChrome's Artist class

member.name: M:MediaChrome.IPlayEngine.FindArtist(System.String)
member.summary: Find an artist
member.returns: Return an array of the founded artist at the engine

member.name: M:MediaChrome.IPlayEngine.GetAlbum(System.String)
member.summary: Get an album
member.param: The name or ID of the album to locate, depending on the service
member.returns: An instance of the album enclosed into an Album class instance
member.remarks: Used in conjunction with views frameworks

member.name: M:MediaChrome.IPlayEngine.FindAlbum(System.String)
member.summary: Find an album

member.name: M:MediaChrome.IPlayEngine.Find(System.String)
member.summary: Query for songs on the service cloud

member.name: M:MediaChrome.IPlayEngine.SongImport(MediaChrome.Song[])
member.summary: Import songs into the local library according to the specifications.

member.name: M:MediaChrome.IPlayEngine.Play
member.summary: Starts playing the current song

member.name: M:MediaChrome.IPlayEngine.Pause
member.summary: Occurs when pausing

member.name: M:MediaChrome.IPlayEngine.Stop
member.summary: Occurs when stopping

member.name: M:MediaChrome.IPlayEngine.Seek(System.Double)
member.summary: Occurs when seeking
member.param: The new position of the media

member.name: M:MediaChrome.IPlayEngine.Load(System.String)
member.summary: Occurs when loading an song
member.param: The data uri associated with the song

member.name: M:MediaChrome.IPlayEngine.Import(System.Data.SQLite.SQLiteConnection,System.String)
member.summary: Import music to the local database
member.param: SQLiteConnection instance for accessing the internal database
The file directory for the local files to recurse on

member.name: M:MediaChrome.IPlayEngine.Unload
member.summary: Unload the engine

member.name: M:MediaChrome.IPlayEngine.Search
member.summary: Raw search songs from the service

member.name: M:MediaChrome.IPlayEngine.ViewPlaylist(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Playlist-related functionality
member.returns: A instance of the playlist class with content from this source

member.name: M:MediaChrome.IPlayEngine.CreatePlaylist(System.String)
member.summary: Creates an new playlist on the source.
member.param: The desired name of the playlist
member.returns: An instance of an playlist class representing the new playlist.

member.name: M:MediaChrome.IPlayEngine.AddToPlaylist(System.String,MediaChrome.Song,System.Int32)
member.summary: Add an song to an playlist
member.param: The ID of the target playlist on the source
The desired position on the playlist to add on. -1 indicates the last position

member.name: M:MediaChrome.IPlayEngine.RemoveFromPlaylist(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Remove a song at the specified index on the playlist.
member.param: The ID of the playlist, specific for the service
The index of the song which should be removed

member.name: M:MediaChrome.IPlayEngine.MoveSongPlaylist(System.String,MediaChrome.Song,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Moves an entry through the playlist, the collection between the starting and end index.
member.param: start index of the chunk to move

member.name: M:MediaChrome.IPlayEngine.LoadPlaylist(System.String,MediaChrome.Views.Playlist@)
member.summary: Load an playlist and return the list. Obsolote.
